original_text: But if you will not do so, behold, you have sinned against the Lord, and be sure your sin will find you out.
korean_text: 너희가 만일 그같이 아니하면 여호와께 범죄함이니 너희 죄가 반드시 너희를 찾아낼 줄 알라

sentences.original_text: But if you will not do so
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 만약 너희가 그렇게 하지 않으면

sentences.original_text: you have sinned against the Lord
your sin will find you out
